backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing announcements, events, and inquiries with create and query functions using in‑memory maps and timestamp‑based sorting.
feature_evidence.json: Placeholder feature evidence report with an empty features array.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files including pages, hooks, and configuration.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide outlining prerequisites, asset checks, and steps for deploying to the IC mainnet.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes and applying global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/scripts/smoke-test.mjs: Node script performing smoke tests on critical routes and assets for production deployments.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with root layout and routes for Home, Learn More, and Special Event pages.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer displaying logo, quick links, contact details, and caffeine.ai attribution using assetUrl.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Responsive header with logo and navigation links, including mobile menu via Sheet.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Root layout wrapping pages with Header, content outlet, and Footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentTitle.ts: Sets the browser document title whenever the given title changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, stored identities, and AuthClient configuration.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark theme variables and typography rules.
frontend/src/lib/assetUrl.ts: Builds correct asset URLs using Vite’s BASE_URL for dev and production.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, QueryClient, and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Home page with hero section, highlights, and academic year info using styled components and asset images.
frontend/src/pages/LearnMore.tsx: Learn More page describing the school’s mission, features, and facilities.
frontend/src/pages/SpecialEvent.tsx: Special Event page detailing an annual fete with date, location, and invitation information.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON describing the project’s state, scope, requirements, branding details, and planned features for the school website.
